question: I have one of those mystery issues.  My brother and I (I'm female) have very similar symptoms- he's 25 and I'm 31.  My dad's brother also has some similar type symptoms.  Our symptoms are very similar to Myotonic Dystrophy (ruled out through genetic testing) and Multiple Sclerosis (not showing that with testing)I have have multiple MRIs, a spinal tap, muscle biopsy in my bicep, ...you name it.Our shared symptoms are:*tremors in arms and legs- sometimes feeling like they come from our very core.*muscle fatigue- doesn't take a whole lot.  Holding a child for a couple of minutes and my arms have nothing to give.  My hand cramps up and is tired after writing out a check.  Squatting down is a nightmare- it hurts.*Some joint stiffness - getting up from a sitting position, it takes a bit to oil the joints again.*Difficulty swallowing- it's like the throat just forgets how to work.*Gastroparesis - recent diagnosis.  Does not come with any Diabetes symptoms.Any ideas on where we go next?  What tests we should push for?  We're at a loss.
title: Just need direction
